gate.learning

Class LightWeightLearningApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.LightWeightLearningApi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.util.Benchmarkable

    public class LightWeightLearningApi
extends Object
implements gate.util.Benchmarkable
    Do all the main learning tasks, such as obtaining the feature vectors from GATE annotations, training and application. Also filtering out some negative examples if want.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      NLPFeaturesList featuresList
      Object of the NLP feature list.
      String inputASName
      The annotationSet containing annotations considered in the DATASET element of configuration file.
      Label2Id labelsAndId
      Object of the label list.
      String outputASName
      The annotationSet for the resulting annotations by application of models.
